title.romaji: Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai.
title.native: 猫田のことが気になって仕方ない。

description:
An anime adaptation of the Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai. manga screened at the Ribon Festa 2015 event.

A girl named Mikiko sees the face of a popular boy in her class as a cat's face.

title.romaji: Nekota no Koto ga Ki ni Natte Shikatanai.
Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai. (ONA)
title.english: Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai. (ONA)

title.native: エクスメイデン 居酒屋たまき
エクスメイデン

description:
In 20XX C.E., a mysterious alien race named Firow suddenly appears on Earth. The Firow's dreadful attacks force humanity to engage in a difficult battle. But humanity's last hope, the X Maiden who wear weapons built to destroy the Firow, are about to set out.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Nemure Omoi Ko, Sora no Shitone ni
title.english: Sleep tight my baby, cradled in the sky
title.native: ねむれ思い子 空のしとねに

description:
A family was riding a car on their way home from a maternity hospital. Satomi and Yasunori were taking their newborn baby named "Orine" home and were filled with happy expectation. However, a sudden accident attacked them. Orine lost her parents, and she became alone.

Nineteen years have passed, and she has grown up. She was pursued by the police because of an incident. She continued to escape, but Yuri Aoshima, a member of a shady organization, tried to contact her. Orine agreed to Yuri's demand, which was going to an experimental space station. Yuri will help her to escape, instead.

Somehow, only Orine can enter an unmanned space station. Surprisingly, the person who was waiting for Orine was her mother, Satomi. She appeared in the similitude of her twenties. Orine was perplexed, and Yuri demanded to turn the power off of the station. Unwillingly, she started to place the shut-down device, but she believed that it will solve the mystery and help her mother.

As Orine and Satomi spend time together, they made up for their lost time. Yuri's aim, Satomi's true identity, and a man called "SENSEI" who is involved in taking over the station.

While the mystery deepens, Orine gets closer to the "truth"...

(Source: Official website)

title.romaji: Anitore! XX: Hitotsu Yane no Shita de
title.native: あにトレ!!XX ~ひとつ屋根の下で~

description: The second season to Anitore! EX.

title.native: 風夏

description:
The story centers on a young man named Yuu Haruna who has just switched schools. He's a bit shy, and he's constantly glued to his smartphone so he can check Twitter. He meets a girl named Fuuka Akitsuki, who doesn't even have a cell phone, is free-spirited, and naturally fascinates others. Yuu recently has been getting back in touch via Twitter with his childhood friend Koyuki Hinashi, who is now a popular singer. One day Yuu invites Fuuka to one of Koyuki's concerts, and there the three meet for the first time. The story follows the love triangle between a love that started through electronics, and a love that didn't start through electronics.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Imouto to Sono Yuujin ga Ero Sugite Ore no Kokan ga Yabai
title.native: 妹とその友人がエロすぎて俺の股間がヤバイ

description:
Based on the erotic game by Pachi Pachi Soft.

After becoming a mathematics teacher for his sister Miu and his friend Riko, Kanata realizes that he feels more popular than he is at school. Kanata is an expert in mathematics, which makes him feel a dilemma when Riko likes him and also behind his tsundere sister who feels jealous because his brother is always looking at other girls breasts than Miu own.

(Source: Nekopoi which has Been Translated)

title.romaji: Imouto to Sono Yuujin ga Ero Sugite Ore no Kokan ga Yabai

title.native: おいでよ！私立ヤリま×り学園

description:
The Principal changed the school rules by encouraging all his students to have sex so they could be more eager to follow the lessons and go to school. The chairman of the Mira Committee disagreed with the regulation. Another student on sex while Mira just want to rest on the roof of the school building. At that time, he met a man lying alone by showing off his penis.

(Source: Nekopoi and Has Been Translated)

title.romaji: Bishoujo Yuugi Unit Crane Game Girls Galaxy
title.native: 美少女遊戯ユニットクレーンゲール ギャラクシー

description: The second season of Bishoujo Yuugi Unit Crane Game Girls.

title.romaji: Bishoujo Yuugi Unit Crane Game Girls

title.english: Re:PETIT ~Re: Starting Life in Another World From PETIT~
title.native: Re:プチから始める異世界生活

description: A collection of comedic shorts featuring characters from Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu. A continuation of Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Break Time.

title.romaji: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Kyuukei Jikan (Break Time)
Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Kyuukei Jikan (Break Time) 2nd Season
Mahou Shoujo Nante Mou Ii desu kara. 2
title.english: Mahou Shoujo Nante Mouiidesukara Second Season
title.native: 魔法少女なんてもういいですから。 2

description:
The second season of Mahou Shoujo Nante Mouiidesukara. The comedy manga follows Yuzuka Hanami, a young girl who has few friends but who can do anything. One day, Yuzuka gets accosted by a strange creature named Miton who is digging through a trash dump. Miton tells Yuzuka, "you have the makings of a magical girl" and seems extremely suspicious. When Yuzuka is suddenly transformed into a magical girl, she's wearing a swimsuit.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Mahou Shoujo Nante Mou Ii desu kara.
Mahou Shoujo Nante Mou Ii desu kara.
Kidou Senshi Gundam Thunderbolt: December Sky
title.english: Mobile Suit Gundam Thunderbolt: December Sky
title.native: 機動戦士ガンダム サンダーボルト December Sky

description:
During the One Year War of U.C. 0079, the Earth Federation and Principality of Zeon engage in a fierce battle at the "Thunderbolt Sector", a shoal zone in the former Colony Side 4 "Moore". After successfully infiltrating Zeon's sniper field, ace Federation pilot and jazz enthusiast Io Fleming is given control of the latest Gundam prototype.

(Source: Gundam Wikia)

title.romaji: Kidou Senshi Gundam Thunderbolt: BANDIT FLOWER
title.english: Mobile Suit Gundam Thunderbolt: Bandit Flower

title.native: ID-0

description:
I-Machines are the general term for robots that operate in extreme environments. While Alliance Academy student Maya Mikuri is in the middle of operating an I-Machine, she gets involved in an incident with pirates, and ends up serving as a crew member on an excavation company's spaceship.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: 戦国鳥獣戯画～甲～

description:
The anime uses a sumi-e (traditional Japanese ink painting) motif, and features Japan's famous Sengoku-era warlords as animals. The show depicts the characters in historically important events as well as in casual everyday situations.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

title.native: てーきゅう8

description:
Eighth season of Teekyuu.

Teekyuu is based on a sports comedy manga of the same name featuring four high school girls who belong to a tennis club. Although the amount of tennis they play is questionable.

title.native: あおおに ～じ・あにめぇしょん～

description: The Ao Oni ~The Animation~ television series will be a comedic take on the original story with the familiar characters drawn in super-deformed style.

title.native: 青鬼 The Animation

description:
The film Ao Oni The Animation will be closer to the traditional mystery horror of the original game, although it will have a new story that is different from the original game, novelization, and live-action films.

The story takes place in a suburban town by a mountain forest. The five members of the high school's folklore research club are trying to think of ideas for the culture festival when they discover a former member's collection of research notes from 40 years ago. The legend described in the notes resembles a popular free game called "Ao Oni," so they choose the game as their culture festival theme. They are able to meet with the game's creator, but shortly afterward the creator dies mysteriously. The club members are investigating the mystery at the school when the door shuts and they find themselves locked inside.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: BanG Dream!（バンドリ！）

description:
Kasumi Toyama was enthralled by the stars as a young girl, so when she discovers a trail of star-shaped signs one day after transferring to a new school, she can't help but follow them. They lead her to a shop run by the grandmother of one of her new classmates, and Kasumi finds something that will change her life forever: a star-shaped guitar! And just like that, Kasumi knows that forming a band is her destiny.

Of course, convincing Arisa and her grandmother to sell her the guitar won't be easy, and finding a group of other girls who want to become musicians will be even harder. But when a girl has stars in her eyes and a starbeat in her heart, there's nothing that will stop Kasumi from making her fantasies come true!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

title.romaji: BanG Dream!: Girls Band Party! - Roselia Stage
title.english: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Roselia Stage

title.romaji: Hashiri Hajimeta bakari no Kimi ni

title.native: 300円のおつきあい

description:
Based on the adult manga by Shouji Ayumu

Even though she is 18 years old, Manami-chan loves snack foods, and behaves like a child. Our protagonist meets Manami at the supermarket and upon noticing her bad mood, buys her snacks out of pity. However, those snacks are attached to one condition: that Manami-chan has sex with him. Snacks, sex, snacks, sex. This pattern repeats until one day, something happens...

(Source: Nekopoi and Has Been Translated)

title.romaji: Doraemon: Shin Nobita no Nippon Tanjou
title.native: 映画ドラえもん　新・のび太の日本誕生

description:
The 36th Doraemon movie. This is a remake of the 1989 film Doraemon: Nobita no Nippon Tanjou.

Nobita wants to run away from home, again. He finds out that there is nowhere for him to go. All the land is owned by someone. His friends end up wanting to run away also, even Doraemon. They figure out that the only way to find land that isn't owned by anyone is to go back in time to when no humans existed. They end up helping a prehistoric boy rescue his tribe from Gigazombie.

title.english: Doraemon: Nobita at the Birth of Japan

title.native: 少女達の茶道ism THE ANIMATION

description:
One of the School Clubs invites his mentor teacher in club activities, but his mentor teacher is just being toyed by members of his club and making his mentor teacher to take powerful stimulants. To stop it, he had to take a drug neutralizer stimulants, but the drug neutralizer stimulants was poured into the feet of the club members. The only way, and inevitably, the tutor should lick their feet one by one to get the neutralizer of the stimulant drug.

(Source: Nekopoi, translated)

title.romaji: Hachishaku Hachiwa Keraku Meguri: Igyou Kaikitan The Animation
title.native: 八尺八話快樂巡り ～異形怪奇譚～ The Animation

description: Once there was this kid, a simple lad who just loved life. Let's call him A-kun. One day, while he was playing outside, he sees a spooky figure off in the distance - in the form of a giantess. He ran back indoors, fearing for his life. His parents did all they could to protect him from this evil spirit. Despite their best efforts, the she-devil still managed to get inside the house...

title.native: GODZILLA -怪獣惑星-

description:
The appearance of the giant living creatures “Kaiju's” and the ultimate existence that destroys all monsters, Godzilla, has incited a battle that lasted for half a century. Humanity has experienced continuous defeat, and finally plans to escape from the Earth. In 2048, only those who were selected by the A.I. managed under the central government boarded the inter-sidereal emigrant spaceship “Aratrum” to head for “Tau Cetus e”, the planet beyond the distance of 11.9 light-year. However, the environmental condition differences between that of the Earth and Tau e were considered to be inhabitable by human beings.

The young man on the emigrant ship: Haruo, who saw his parents killed by Godzilla in front of his eyes, had only one thing in his mind for 20 years: to return to the Earth and defeat Godzilla. Shut out from the possibility of emigration, as the living environment in the ship deteriorates, the group of “Earth Returnists” led by Haruo are determined to return through a dangerous long-distance hyperspace navigation. However, 20,000 years have passed on Earth since and it has become an unknown world with the ecosystem reigned by Godzilla.

(Source: Official Website, edited)

title.english: Godzilla: City on the Edge of Battle

title.native: 一騎当千 Extravaganza Epoch

description:
Kansai fighters have begun raiding the Kanto area in order to pillage sacred beads. As members of all three of the main schools come under attack, Ryuubi and friends try to figure out a solution that results in the fewest casualties.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガードG NEXT

description:
Team TRY3 members Chrono Shindou, Shion Kiba and Tokoha Anjou move forward to their respective high schools. Each member forms their own team in a bid to decide their own future. The three protagonists are set to clash as rivals in the upcoming large-scale tournament titled U20 Championship.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: 猫のダヤン ふしぎ劇場

description: Third season of Dayan the Cat. The shorts will be "theatrical-style," with a curtain opening on the everyday adventures of Dayan and his friends.

title.romaji: Neko no Dayan: Nihon e Iku
Tama & Friends: Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?
title.native: タマ&フレンズ うちのタマ知りませんか?

description: A new series following the cat named Tama and his many friends.

title.romaji: 3 Choume no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasenka? 2
title.english: TAMA of the 3rd District -Have You Seen My TAMA?

title.romaji: 3 Choume no Tama: Onegai! Momo-chan wo Sagashite!!
Uchitama?! Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?
title.english: Uchitama?! Have you seen my Tama?

title.romaji: Uchitama?! Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?
title.english: Uchitama?! Have you seen my Tama?

title.romaji: Dayan to Tama to Tobi Neko to: 3-tsu no Neko no Monogatari
3 Choume no Tama: Uchi no Tama Shirimasen ka?

title.native: PJベリーのもぐもぐむにゃむにゃ

description: A series of shorts based on the PaRappa the Rapper character.

title.romaji: PJ Berri no Mogumogu Munyamunya Season 2

title.native: ビキニ・ウォリアーズ

description:
The first episode will focus on Hunter and Valkyrie, who were guest characters in the television anime, as well as two new characters: Cleric and Kunoichi. Hunter and Valkyrie meet Cleric and think she will join them as their healer, but something is strange about her. Then they are attacked by Kunoichi, who seeks legendary bikini armor.

The second episode will focus on Fighter's party after they have overcome hardships, spoken with god, and earned the legendary bikini armor. However, the armor is invisible to idiots.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: CYBORG009 CALL OF JUSTICE 1

description: The story will depict Joe Shimamura and the other cyborgs' struggle with the Bresudo, a group of people who possess superhuman powers and intellect, and have manipulated human history since ancient times. Their goals are unknown, and they cast a dark shadow over the world. Though few people believe in the Bresdo's existence, one American journalist named Lucie Davenport heads to Texas to contact a certain family, and she meets the cyborgs. The cyborgs themselves have been freed from their duty of protecting humanity ever since the establishment of the UN Guardian troops, and they now live quiet lives of peace.

title.native: CYBORG009 CALL OF JUSTICE 2

description: The second movie in the rebooted franchise.

title.native: CYBORG009 CALL OF JUSTICE 3

description: The third installment of the rebooted franchise

title.native: ガールフレンド（♪）

description:
In the anime's story, the group "nonet" ends up working on a play with the group "Ootori" from the Ootori Song Academy. The play is Cinderella, but with a special twist. Momoko Asahina will play Cinerella, Miyabi Kunishiro will play the prince, and Kokomi Shina will play an unexpected role.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: OZMAFIA!! Special

description: Bundled with BD/DVD.

title.romaji: Boku no Hero Academia: Sukue! Kyuujo Kunren!
title.native: 僕のヒーローアカデミア救え!救助訓練!

description:
UA High School must regain the public's confidence after the surprise villain attack during class 1-A's training session. Although some of the teachers were gravely injured in the attack, Izuku "Deku" Midoriya and his classmates must continue to learn and train, and utilize their quirks in varying environments and circumstances.

Boku no Hero Academia: Sukue! Kyuujo Kunren! follows class 1-A as they attempt to finally complete their training. However, there's a masked figure roaming around the training center. Have the villains responsible for the previous incident returned to finish the job? If so, are the students ready to fight back?

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

(Note: This OVA was initially screened at Jump Festa 2016 on November 27, 2016. The OVA was later bundled with the 13th volume of the manga, released on April 4, 2017.)

title.native: 機動警察パトレイバーREBOOT

description: Mobile Police Patlabor Reboot is an animated movie that was originally released as part of Japan Animator Expo.

title.native: Fate/kaleid liner プリズマ☆イリヤ ツヴァイ ヘルツ！『ビースト、再び！』

description: Specials included with the Blu-ray Disc/DVD releases.

title.romaji: Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades - Nazarick Saidai no Kiki
title.native: オーバーロード ぷれぷれぷれあです 『なざりっく最大の危機』

description:
Bundled with novel series' 11th volume. The new anime will feature the appearance of the Pleiades combat maids, as well as the rest of the Floor Guardians.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: ひとりじめマイヒーロー

description:
High schooler Masahiro Setagawa is a fairly helpless delinquent, so much so that the neighborhood bullies use him to run their errands. His life changes when he meets high school teacher Kousuke Oshiba, a man whose fighting abilities have earned him a powerful reputation on the streets. Oshiba finds himself with a desire to protect Setagawa, and despite swearing that he's not interested in men, Setagawa finds himself getting more involved in Oshiba's affairs...

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

title.native: アイドリッシュセブン

description:
A group of aspiring idols gather at Takanashi Productions and are entrusted with the company's future. The seven men who have just met represent a variety of totally different personalities. However, they each have their own charm and possess unknown potential as idols. Forming a group, they take their first step together as "IDOLiSH7." Their brilliantly shining dancing forms onstage eventually begin captivating the hearts of the people.

(Source: Anime News Network)

Episodes 1-2 were pre-streamed on November 3, 2017.

title.romaji: IDOLiSH7: First BEAT! Gekijou Soushuu-hen - Zenpen
IDOLiSH7: First BEAT! Gekijou Soushuu-hen - Kouhen

title.native: けものフレンズ

description:
The anime's story takes place in Japari Park, a "gigantic integrated zoo." In the zoo, due to the mysterious "sand star" substance, the animals start turning into human-shaped creatures called Animal Girls. Japari Park is a place where many people visit and have fun at, but one day a lost child wanders into the park. The lost child starts a journey to return, but because so many Animal Girls join in on the quest it becomes an unexpected grand adventure.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.english: Animelo Summer Live 2017 x Kemono Friends

title.romaji: Nissin no Donbei x Kemono Friends: Fukkura
Kemono Friends: Youkoso Japari Park e!
title.english: Kemono Friends: Welcome to Japari Park

title.romaji: Kemono Friends: Comic À La Carte - Japari Park-hen

title.native: MEKAKUCITY RELOAD

description:
The four-part Niconico streaming program "Seek at Mekakucity," which began on August 7 and featured Kagerou Project characters, ended on Tuesday with an announcement that the franchise will get "more anime." The end of the video reveals a tentative title for a new anime: "Mekakucity Reload."

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: 最遊記RELOAD BLAST

description:
Humans and yokai, science and magic... all exist side-by-side on a peaceful continent free of all order and regulation, widely known as "Shangri-La." The balance there was shattered when the Minus Wave caused all the yokai on the continent to rampage, an event known as the "Calamity." Continuing their journey west to stop Gyumaoh's resurrection experiments, the root of all the evil on the continent, the Three Aspects are finally drawing closer to India. But the closer they get, the more pronounced the influence of the Calamity becomes, and the more intense their battles become.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.romaji: MONSTER STRIKE THE MOVIE: Hajimari no Basho e
title.native: モンスターストライク THE MOVIE はじまりの場所へ

description: The Monster Strike film will feature a character named Lucifer.

title.english: Monster Strike: Winter Special - Rain of Memories

title.native: カブキブ！

description:
The series revolves around Kurogo Kurusu, a high school student who loves kabuki so much that it's annoying. Kurogo yearns to perform kabuki as part of a club at his school, but currently his school doesn't have a kabuki club. So Kurogo sets out to create a kabuki club, and his first order of business is to gather members.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.native: バキ 最凶死刑囚編SP(スペシャル)アニメ

description: Bundled with the limited edition of 14th Baki-Dou manga volume.

title.romaji: New Grappler Baki: In Search of Our Strongest Hero
title.english: Baki: The Search of our Strongest Hero

title.native: メガトン級ムサシ

description: The story takes place after 90 percent of humanity wiped out due to an invasion. Survivors live in a shelter where their lives are monitored, and memories of the invasion erased. Three teenagers from the shelter are chosen to pilot three machines that combine to form the Musashi robot, made out of a material named Megatronium alloy. The series will balance robot action with school life.

title.romaji: Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru
title.native: されど罪人は竜と踊る

description:
The story revolves around "jushiki" (lit. spell equations), the equations that govern the quantum constant "h" of action, change the laws of physics at the local scale, give birth to TNT explosives and poison gas, and cause incredible physical phenomena such as plasma and nuclear fusion. Two "jushikishi" (spell equationists) who use jushiki in battle are Gayus (who deals with bad luck with tact) and the beautiful but cruel sword-wielder Gigina. These two bounty hunters are caught up in a battle with dragons in the city of Eridana and in the intrigue of great nations.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru
Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru: Rinbu
Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryuu to Odoru
Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 1
